hadiths.text: Narrated `Ikrima:Ibn `Abbas said, "How can you ask the people of the Scriptures about their Books while you have Allah's Book (the Qur'an) which is the most recent of the Books revealed by Allah, and you read it in its pure undistorted form?

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ}
chapter.eng-name: “….Every day He is in some affair!”
